ygData.subject: Re: Rude Awakening
ygData.msgSnippet: The ship that burns through the atmosphere is on a coarse towards turkey, and huge shockwaves from the sound of its engines blowing up, scatter the earth.

References: <l03010d01b6d4a13ecb14@[204.174.146.18]> <l03010d09b6d470dd6d53@[204.174.146.18]> <3AAE5763.3330.2FBF02BC@localhost> <00d001c0abd7$f627dda0$b61d4418@...>

To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Rude Awakening
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

The ship that burns through the atmosphere is on a coarse towards turkey,
and huge shockwaves from the sound of its engines blowing up, scatter the
earth. Inside, the little red robot in the control chair gets flung back
out of the chair and against the larger robot who is trying to put out the
fires with liquid nitrogen. The two collide, and land in the stream of
Liquid Nitrogen, being frozen in the beam. The little blue robot presses
the button on the control pad to keep the emergency message playing at
intervals, and just as he presses it, he is flung up against and engine
wall, his back being seriously burnt, and a sickening thud can be heard as
his head hits metal, and rips apart.

The ship then makes hard impact with the ground, and leaves a huge running
crater as it moves forward, through the earth. It then runs to a stop, and
the back of it explodes violently, sending pieces of burning shrapnel miles
around. The two frozen robots get thrown violently, and the larger ones
casing shatters, as his arm goes with it, he weakly looks up, and then
colapses. Everything turns silent, except for the repeating message,
"emergency, our ship is out of control, we will require assistance, and
more than likely,
repairs when we crash".
